properties.Name: LeaseEquipment
properties.Description: The equipment to be covered by the Equipment Lease.

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: AssetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Asset.

Columns.Name: EquipmentSerialNumber
Columns.Description: The serial number of the equipment.

Columns.Name: EquipmentDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the equipment including its operating status.

Columns.Name: EquipmentPurchaseDate
Columns.Description: The date that the Equipment was purchased.

Columns.Name: EquipmentPurchaseCost
Columns.Description: The purchase cost of the equipment.
